item.description:
It's Greater Boston Young Republican night at the Healey HQ! Head over for an hour or two to help the next Governor of the Commonwealth!

~Time: 5:30-8:00PM

After we are done doing campaign stuff we will then head over to The Living Room for Team Trivia. We're asking for folks to arrive at TLR around 7PM to secure a space and our team for the event. Trivia starts at 8PM.

The Living Room
101 Atlantic Avenue
http://www.thelivingr...

(just a short walk from 85 Merrimac.)

If you have any trouble finding the Mass GOP HQ or getting in, please call my cell: (617) 784-7764. - Patrick

For more information, see http://www.healeycomm...
item.name: Healey Tuesdays
